#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,m,n,sum;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		m=n;
		sum=0;
		while(m)
		{
			sum+=m%10;
			m/=10;
		}
		printf("%d\n",(n*(1<<sum)));
	}
	return 0;
}
